text: Starz Distribution (formerly known as: IDT Entertainment, and DiC Audiovisual) is an American production company known for producing Wow! Wow! Wubbzy!, The Amazing World of Gumball, Starz, StarzEncore, George Washington, and more. ==Other websites== * * * Category:American entertainment companies Category:Companies based in Burbank, California Category:2003 establishments in California
title: Starz Distribution
